function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Public health emergency, travel restrictions, tourism decline","Mitigation":"Vaccination, public health measures, travel restrictions","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, temperature screening","People":"Global population, tourists, travelers","Owner":"Public health agencies, governments, tourism industry"},{"Description":"Losses in international tourism receipts","Impact":"Economic losses, job losses, tourism revenue decline","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus, tourism industry support, marketing campaigns","Technologies":"Economic modeling, digital marketing, virtual tourism experiences","People":"Tourism industry workers, businesses, government","Owner":"Governments, tourism industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through human-to-human contact","Impact":"Disease spread, travel restrictions, public health risk","Mitigation":"Social distancing, mask-wearing, hygiene practices","Technologies":"Health apps, contact tracing apps, testing technologies","People":"Global population, travelers, public health workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, governments, individuals"}]}
